nodes.text: The Albarrio sector, or Aris sector was located in the Outer Rim Territories and bordered Relgim sector at the Maelstrom.
The sector was governed by Moff Vanko.

Pirates & Privateers established that Aris sector neighbored the Maelstrom. However, Riders of the Maelstrom had previously established that the planet Aris was located in Albarrio sector. It also mentioned the Aris Sector taskforce. As such, these are treated as alternate names for the same sector.
